item.title: FT Most Read: Tuesday, November 5, 2024 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Polls open after Harris and Trump finish their final push
2. The 7 charts that define the 2024 US presidential campaign
3. Ukraine says it has attacked North Korean troops in Kursk
4. [Opinion] Musk has parked his Tesla on the White House lawn
5. UK tax plan for wealthy foreigners risks turning London into ‘bigger version of Bahamas’
